Verses: 1 oodhs Dhesaththile Yobu Ennum Perkonda Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Andha Manushan Uththamanum Sanmaarkkanum, Dhevanukku Bayandhu, Pollaappukku Vilagugiravanumaayirundhaan.
2 avanukku Ezhu Kumaararum, Moondru Kumaaraththigalum Pirandhaargal.

3 avanukku Ezhaayiram Aadugalum, Moovaayiram Ottagangalum, Ainnooru Ermaadugalum, Ainnooru Kazhudhaigalumaagiya Mirugajeevangal Irundhadhumandri, Thiralaana Panividaikkaararumirundhaargal; Adhinaal Andha Manushan Kizhakkaththip Puththirar Ellaarilum Periyavanaayirundhaan.
4 avan Kumaarar, Avanavan Thanthan Naalile Thanthan Veettile Virundhuseydhu, Thangal Moondru Sagodharigalaiyum Thangalode Pojanam Pannumpadi Azhaippaargal.

5 virundhuseygira Avaravarudaiya Naalmurai Mudigirapodhu, Yobu: Oruvelai En Kumaarar Paavancheydhu Dhevanaith Thangal Irudhayaththile Dhooshiththiruppaargal Endru Solli, Avargalai Azhaiththanuppi, Parisuththappaduththi, Adhikaalame Ezhundhu, Avargal Ellaarudaiya Lakkaththinpadiyeyum Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalai Seluththuvaan; Indhappragaaramaaga Annaatkalilellaam Seydhuvaruvaan.
6 orunaal Dhevapuththirar Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu Nindrapodhu, Saaththaanum Avargal Naduvile Vandhu Nindraan.
7 karththar Saaththaanaip Paarththu: Nee Engeyirundhu Varugiraai Endraar. Saaththaan Karththarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Boomiyengum Ulaavi, Adhil Sutriththirindhu Varugiren Endraan.

8 karththar Saaththaanai Nokki: En Dhaasanaagiya Yobinmel Gavanam Vaiththaayo? Uththamanum Sanmaarkkanum, Dhevanukku Bayandhu, Pollaappukku Vilagugiravanumaagiya Avanaippola Boomiyil Oruvanum Illai Endraar.
9 adharku Saaththaan Karththarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Yobu Virudhaavaagavaa Dhevanukku Bayandhu Nadakkiraan?
10 neer Avanaiyum Avan Veettaiyum Avanukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Sutri Veliyadaikkavillaiyo? Avan Kaigalin Kiriyaiyai Aaseervadhiththeer; Avanudaiya Sambaththu Dhesaththil Perugitru.
11 aanaalum Ummudaiya Kaiyai Neetti Avanukku Undaanavaiyellaam Thoduveeraanaal, Appozhudhu Avan Umadhu Mugaththukku Edhire Ummai Dhooshikkaano Paarum Endraan.

12 karththar Saaththaanai Nokki: Idho, Avanukku Undaanavaiyellaam Un Kaiyilirukkiradhu; Avanmelmaaththiram Un Kaiyai Neettaadhe Endraar; Appozhudhu Saaththaan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyaivittup Purappattupponaan.
13 pinbu Orunaal Yobudaiya Kumaararum, Avan Kumaaraththigalum, Thangal Mooththa Sagodharan Veettile Pusiththu, Dhraatcharasam Kudikkirapodhu,
14 oru Aal Avanidaththil Vandhu: Erudhugal Uzhugirapodhu, Kazhudhaigal Avaigalin Pakkaththile Meyndhukondirukkaiyil,

15 sabeyar Avaigalmel Vizhundhu, Avaigalai Saaiththukkonduponaargal; Velaiyaatkalaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vettippottaargal; Naan Oruvan Maaththiram Thappi, Adhai Umakku Arivikkumpadi Vandhen Endraan.

16 ivan Ippadip Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Veroruvan Vandhu: Vaanaththilirundhu Dhevanudaiya Akkini Vizhundhu, Aadugalaiyum Velaiyaatkalaiyum Sutteriththuppottadhu; Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Thappi, Adhai Umakku Arivikkumpadi Vandhen Endraan.

17 ivan Ippadip Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Veroruvan Vandhu: Kaldheyar Moondru Pavunjaai Vandhu, Ottagangalmel Vizhundhu, Avaigalai Ottikkonduponaargal, Velaiyaatkalaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vettippottaargal; Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Thappi, Adhai Umakku Arivikkumpadi Vandhen Endraan.
18 ivan Ippadip Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Veroruvan Vandhu: Ummudaiya Kumaararum Ummudaiya Kumaaraththigalum, Thangal Mooththa Sagodharan Veettile Pusiththu Dhraatcharasam Kudikkirapodhu,

19 vanaandhara Vazhiyaaip Perungaatru Vandhu, Andha Veettin Naalu Moolaiyilum Adikka, Adhu Pillaigalinmel Vizhundhadhinaal Avargal Irandhuponaargal; Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Thappi, Adhai Umakku Arivikkumpadi Vandhen Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Yobu Ezhundhirundhu, Than Saalvaiyaik Kizhiththu, Than Thalaiyai Siraiththu, Tharaiyile Vizhundhu Panindhu:
21 nirvaaniyaai En Thaayin Karppaththilirundhu Vandhen; Nirvaaniyaai Avvidaththukkuth Thirumbuven; Karththar Koduththaar, Karththar Eduththaar; Karththarudaiya Naamaththukku Sthoththiram Endraan.
22 ivaiyellaavatrilum Yobu Paavancheyyavumillai, Dhevanaippatrik Kuraisollavumillai.
